card_text: Activate 1 of these effects, but skip your next Battle Phase after activation;$N●Target 1 Special Summoned monster your opponent controls; destroy it, then banish the top 2 cards of your opponent's Deck.$N●Special Summon 1 "Runick" monster from your Extra Deck to the Extra Monster Zone.$NYou can only activate 1 "Runick Flashing Fire" per turn.
